title: 01/27/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/27/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by a handful of guests. The Buc's Scotty Miller joins us and says he's the fastest player in the NFL. Former Hesiman Winner Carson Palmer explains what's it like to have Bruce Arians as a Coach. And the great Bob Costas calls in to discuss Curt Schilling, Barry Bonds and Rogers Clemens Hall of Fame candidacy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by a handful of guests. The Buc's Scotty Miller joins us and says he's the fastest player in the NFL. Former Hesiman Winner Carson Palmer explains what's it like to have Bruce Arians as a Coach. And the great Bob Costas calls in to discuss Curt Schilling, Barry Bonds and Rogers Clemens Hall of Fame candidacy.
